# Archived Creator Skills

These individual creator skills have been superseded by the unified **artifact-creator** skill at `.github/skills/artifact-creator/`.

The individual skills are preserved here as reference but should not be used directly. Use the unified skill instead.

**Superseded skills:**
- `agent-creator` → merged into artifact-creator
- `artifact-author` → merged into artifact-creator
- `copilot-instructions-creator` → merged into artifact-creator
- `instruction-creator` → merged into artifact-creator
- `prompt-creator` → merged into artifact-creator
- `skill-creator` → merged into artifact-creator
